tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE satellite_communication_logs (
  log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  satellite_id INT,
  message TEXT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE satellites (
    satellite_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    satellite_name VARCHAR(255),
    launch_date DATE,
    orbit_altitude_km FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE communication_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    satellite_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    communication_status VARCHAR(50),
    message_text TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE communication_errors (
    error_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    log_id INT,
    error_type VARCHAR(50),
    error_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE troubleshooting_notes (
    note_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    log_id INT,
    note_text TEXT,
    engineer_name VARCHAR(100)
)
